ing.item: Bag frozen Fiesta Blend mixed veggies (broccoli; carrots, white beans; Kidney beans, Garbanzo beans; Italian cut green beans; & red pepper)
Chopped onion (Vidalia or other sweet onion is best)
Bottle Old Dutch sweet & sour salad dressing
Kraft FF Honey Dijon salad dressing

directions.step:
Date: Thu, 13 Jun 1996 12:37:54 -0400
From: CZerby@aol.com
Marinate first 3 ingredients in Sweet & Sour Dressing; stirring frequently until veggies are defrosted. Cook pasta according to package; rinse with cold water. Add pasta to veggie/marinade mixture & blend well. If you have time, let this marinate for a while longer. Add FF Honey Dijon dressing to taste; adding small amount of FF Miracle Whip for zip. (Really needs this) Mix well & refrigerate until serving time. Stir once in a while to blend flavors.
